post.subject: Version 2.6 Nameless Honor Details
post.content: Hello, Trailblazers! During the event, Trailblazers can increase their Nameless Honor level to obtain rewards such as Star Rail Passes, Self-Modeling Resins, and Tracks of Destiny. After unlocking Nameless Glory, Trailblazers can immediately obtain Stellar Jade ×680. Increasing Nameless Honor levels can allow Trailblazers to additionally obtain Star Rail Special Pass ×4, 4-star Light Cone of your choice, Self-Modeling Resin ×1, Relic Remains, universal path material Tears of Dreams, and other rewards! If the Trailblazer unlocks the Nameless Medal, in addition to the rewards mentioned above, they will also immediately increase their Nameless Honor level by 10 and receive the avatar "Rappa: Opening," the avatar "Silver Wolf: Opening," as well as 200 Stellar Jades and Fuels! ▌Start Date

post.subject: Version 2.5 Nameless Honor Details
post.content: Hello, Trailblazers! During the event, Trailblazers can increase the level of Nameless Honor to obtain rewards such as Star Rail Passes, Self-Modeling Resins, and Tracks of Destiny. After unlocking Nameless Glory, Trailblazers can immediately obtain Stellar Jade ×680. Increasing Nameless Honor levels can allow Trailblazers to additionally obtain Star Rail Special Pass ×4, 4-star Light Cone of your choice, Self-Modeling Resin ×1, Relic Remains, universal path material Tears of Dreams, and other rewards! If the Trailblazer unlocks the Nameless Medal, in addition to the rewards mentioned above, they will also immediately increase their Nameless Honor level by 10 and receive the avatar "Feixiao: Fitness," the avatar "Moze: Fitness," as well as 200 Stellar Jades and Fuels! ▌Start Date

post.subject: "Divergent Universe: The Human Comedy" Update Details
post.content: After the Version 2.5 update, Divergent Universe: The Human Comedy will add content such as new Equations, Weighted Curios, and Curios, as well as adjusting some content. ▌New Content Encounter new Blessings, Equations, Curios, Weighted Curios, Occurrences, and new Adventure Domains. Synchronicity Level has been expanded to level 80. Increasing the Synchronicity Level grants rewards. Some new Stable Computing Array challenges have been added, with rewards for completion. Adds Threshold Protocols 7 and 8. The new stages do not contain clearance rewards and Stable Computing Array missions, Trailblazers are free to choose to attempt the challenge. Stephen has provided a new adventure arcade machine, which you can use to challenge all Adventure Domains. Obtain new Relics through the Planar Ornament Extraction feature. Adds Inspiration Circuit node "Probability Fixation." Preset Lineup feature is now available when downloading characters. The Clearance Lineup can now be checked in the Save Files. ▌Adjustments Overview
